## IApi.transportContext property

Get the underlying transport context. Especially relevant when running in the browser to distinguish between WebHID and Chrome Extension/Host See enum [TransportContext](./jabra-js.transportcontext.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transportContext: TransportContext;
```
